title: Cyrillic font
content:
It's very similar to FF DIN pro black, but that's not it. Here is the text:

> ВОРУЙ, ПОЛОСКАЙ!

Thanks in advance :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1377180276_1526260436%20-%20%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%8F_5082.jpg)

Font: 

 FF DIN Pro Black 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112540/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Bhuvaneshben

comments.content:
It is FF DIN pro black using alternates, check this link:  
 **[FF DIN pro with alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112540/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_pro_black/opentype_cff/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=36&sample_text=%D0%92%D0%9E%D0%A0%D0%A3%D0%99%2C%20%D0%9F%D0%9E%D0%9B%D0%9E%D0%A1%D0%9A%D0%90%D0%99!&ft=liga%2Csalt&acs_pt=32)**
